column3: Doesn't matter who you're born to… Everyone's still a child of the sea!!
When you decided to go to the sea, it was your own decision. Whatever happens to you on the sea, it depends on what you’ve done!
A place where someone still thinks about you is a place you can call home.
The weak don’t get to decide anything, not even how they die.
Emotion leads one to hate... and hate leads one to conflict and war.
People don’t fear god, fear itself is god
One may stray from the path of a man, one may stray from the path of a woman, but there is no straying from the path of a human!
The government says your existence is a crime, but no matter what kind of weapons you may hold, just being alive isn’t a sin! There’s no crime in living!
Loneliness' is no longer part of my vocabulary.
This thing called Justice… changes its shape depending on where you stand.
